full_text: Screened by NARA 4/18/2023 U.S. Department of Justice FORM G-325A OMB No. 1115-0066 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION Approval expires 4-30-85 (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE (Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY FILE NUMBER PORTILLO- Hernandez PEDRO JOSE FEMALE 04-12-15 Salvadorean 28707386 ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. PEDRO JOSE HERNANEZ (If any) Santa Ana, E1 Salvador 560 84 5218 FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH (If known) CITY AND COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE FATHER HERNANDEZ, Pedro Unk.- Santa Ana, E1 Salvador - Deceased MOTHER (Maiden name) PORTILLO, Luz - Unk. Santa Ana, E1 Salvador- Deceased HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) WIFE San Salvador San Salvador ARDON MARIA L 3-14-11 E1 Salvador 03-23-50 El Salvador FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES (if none, SO state) FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE & PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE NONE APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR 1519 So. Manhattan P1. # 406 Los Angeles CA. USA 01 71 PRESENT TIME 1239 So. Hoover St. Los Angeles CA USA 03 68 01 71 APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR Col. Cucumacayan San Salvador San Salvador El Salvador 1955 1967 APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATION (SPECIFY) MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR None at present Retired PRESENT TIME Ludford Fruit Product Inc.- Los Angeles, CA. Operator 04 68 07 82 Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) I self employed as Merchant in El Salvador 1952 1967 THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE NATURALIZATION STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT OTHER (SPECIFY): SECTION 249 IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET OTHER LETTERS, NATIVE ALPHABET 0403- IN THIS 87 18 IN THAN ROMAN WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR SPACE Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT. APPLICANT: BE SURE TO PUT YOUR NAME AND ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN THE BOX OUTLINED BY HEAVY BORDER BELOW. COMPLETE THIS BOX (Family name) (Given name) (Middle name) (Alien registration number) PORTILLO- HERNANDEZ PEDRO JOSE AKA: HERNANDEZ PEDRO JOSE A28707386 Form G-325A (Rev. 10-1-82) (1) IDENT.
